item.title: About
item.description: I am a Data Scientist ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ”¬ based in Helsinki, Finland. Some people call me a designer ğŸ¨, other people call me a nerd ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’». I do consider myself a little bit both of those, and the truth lies probably somewhere in the middle. I am fascinated by the dynamics in cities and I see it my mission to contribute to liveable cities by understanding the processes within cities through data science methods.
